title: Wilson Statement on Congressman Ryan's Candidacy for Speaker (Joe Wilson)
text: ( Source : Joe Wilson ) Congressman Joe Wilson ( SC-02 ) issued the following statement after Congressman Paul Ryan , Chairman of the House Committee on Ways and Means , announced his candidacy for Speaker of the House of Representatives:
